ComicInfo.Summary:
Spawn continues to build a team made up of his former enemies, including Overt-Kill, Cy-Gor, and more. Could these members of his rogues gallery be his biggest allies?
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Francesco Mattina | 1 | | B | Cover B | Francesco Mattina & Todd McFarlane | Missing |
